_source.short_desc: Pulseway's Network Monitoring software gives you total visibility across your network. Easily Monitor & Control your Network devices.
_source.long_desc: Pulseway's Network Monitoring software gives you total visibility across your network. Automatic discovery and diagramming, makes managing your network simple, intuitive and efficient. Discover your entire IT network and mass deploy the Pulseway agent in minutes so you can have a better insight into what issues are affecting you.
_source.pricing_details:
Pulseway starts with a 14-day-trial, no credit card required.

Pricing is based on the number of systems/endpoints you want to monitor and manage.
_source.target_audience: Managed Service Providers (MSPs), IT departments, IT consultants and System Administrators.

media.caption: Network Monitoring Software Available from Any Device
Control all your devices with Pulseway Network Monitoring.
Automatic discovery and diagramming, makes managing your network simple, intuitive and efficient.
Complete Overview and Real Time Updates from Any Device
Use SHH to Connect to any Remote Device and Troubleshoot It

related_products.short_desc: Cloud Platform is a set of modular cloud-based services that allow you to create anything from simple websites to complex applications.
related_products.features: Google Cloud Platform is a set of modular cloud-based services that allow you to create anything from simple websites to complex applications. New customers get $300 in free credits to fully explore and conduct an assessment of Google Cloud. You won't be charged until you upgrade. Google Cloud Platform offers a modular-based platform providing build and scale services to businesses of any size within any industry. In addition to cloud storage and scalable data warehouses with built-in machine learning, Google Cloud Platform provides relational and non-relational databases for transactions, complex queries, streaming, offline sync, and more. A range of tools for document storage, data warehousing, security key enforcement, app creation, API management, AI and machine learning are also available.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based virtualization platform which helps enterprises with data consolidation, infrastructure security and remote support.
related_products.features:
Cloud-based virtualization platform which helps enterprises with data consolidation, infrastructure security and remote support.
VMware streamlines the journey for organizations to become digital businesses that deliver better experiences to their customers and empower employees to do their best work. Our software spans App Modernization, Cloud, Networking & Security and Digital Workspace.

related_products.short_desc: Atera is the ultimate all-in-one remote IT management solution for MSPs, IT consultants and IT departments. Try Atera for free today!
related_products.features: Atera offers a comprehensive network monitoring for MSPs and IT Professionals. The platform provides one integrated solution: full remote monitoring and management (RMM), PSA, remote access, patch management, billing, reports, and so much more! Atera's disruptive pricing model also helps managed IT service providers scale their business while providing continued best-in-class service. All plans include unlimited devices, meaning you only pay per technician. Try Atera for free today!

related_products.short_desc: Get at-a-glance up/down status and performance info for network devices, servers, storage and wireless - in the cloud or on-premises.
related_products.features: Get at-a-glance up/down status and performance information for network devices, servers, storage and wireless - whether in the cloud or on-premises. Expand your management tool kit by adding proactive monitoring for network traffic, applications, virtual environments and device configurations  all through the same intuitive interface. Automatically discover and map your entire network and use customized dashboards to get the information you need to streamline troubleshooting.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud software that connects people, systems & data into a single view for visibility and actionable intelligence across operations.
related_products.features: PagerDuty, Inc. (NYSE:PD) is a leader in digital operations management. In an always-on world, organizations of all sizes trust PagerDuty to help them deliver a perfect digital experience to their customers, every time. Teams use PagerDuty to identify issues and opportunities in real time and bring together the right people to fix problems faster and prevent them in the future.

related_products.short_desc: Thousands of MSPs and IT Departments use Kaseya VSA Network Monitoring software to automate IT. Get your demo today!
related_products.features: MSPs and internal IT teams get visibility into network performance with Kaseya VSA. Monitor all aspects of network connected devices. Maintain up-time and track key metrics on monitored endpoints and ensure network and system availability. Optimize network performance and eliminate network bottlenecks and performance issues.

related_products.short_desc: New Relic is the only unified data platform that empowers engineers to get all telemetry paired with powerful full-stack analysis tools
related_products.features: New Relic One empowers engineers with a data-driven approach to planning, building, deploying and running software. Offering the only unified data platform that empowers engineers to get all telemetry paired with powerful full-stack analysis tools, New Relic helps engineers get past the what to uncover the why. This improves uptime, reliability and efficiency to deliver exceptional customer experiences that fuel growth. Uncover the why with New Relic.

related_products.short_desc: Trusted by 92 of the fortune 100, Splunk helps you investigate, monitor, analyze, and act on all of your organizations data.
related_products.features: Trusted by 92 of the fortune 100, Splunk is a customizable data analytics platform that empowers you to investigate, monitor, analyze and act. From IT to security to business operations, Splunk is the data-to-everything platform that enables you to take action in real-time. With Splunk, you can predict and prevent IT problems, streamline your entire security stack, minimize unplanned downtime, and explore and visualize business processes for increased transparency all in one platform.

related_products.short_desc: 500,000 reasons to try PRTG Network Monitor: That's the number of users that rely on it every day. Why not start your trial right away?
related_products.features: Say hello to PRTG Network Monitor, our award-winning and all-inclusive monitoring solution. It takes care of everything happening in your IT infrastructure, featuring an easy-to-use and intuitive interface, as well as our mind-blowing customer support. PRTG scales to networks of any size, making life so much easier for our customers with growing networks, as they can simply stick with PRTG. Plus, it obviously saves costs by avoiding critical outages, while optimizing the overall network quality.

related_products.short_desc: Opsgenie is a modern incident management and response solution for operating always-on services.
related_products.features: Opsgenie is a modern incident management and response solution for operating always-on services. We empower Dev and Ops teams to plan for service disruptions and stay in control during incidents. Opsgenie centralizes alerts, notifies the right people reliably, and enables them to take rapid action. Our deep integrations with 200+ ITSM tools enable you to break down silos between Dev and IT Teams, correlate incidents to code deployments, and easily measure the full impact of a major incident.

similar_products.short_desc: ManageEngine OpManager is 5 in 1 integrated network management software for performance monitoring, fault diagnosis & troubleshooting.
similar_products.features: ManageEngine OpManager is an integrated network management platform that helps large enterprises, service providers, and SMEs manage their data centers & IT infrastructure efficiently and cost effectively. It offers network performance monitoring, physical and virtual server monitoring, traffic analysis, configuration management, firewall log management and IP address management. It provides business view, email/sms based alerts, workflow automation, customized reports and combined snapshot view

similar_products.short_desc: The N-able N-central? remote monitoring and management platform is designed to make managing complex IT networks simple.
similar_products.features: The N-able N-central? remote monitoring and management platform is designed to help managed services providers handle complex networks with ease. With extensive automation and in-depth configurability options, security features like antivirus, endpoint detection and response, patch management, and integrated backup, N-central is built to help MSP businesses efficiently manage intricate networks from one easy-to-use platform.

similar_products.short_desc: Network Performance Monitor (NPM) is affordable software that can help you detect, diagnose, and resolve network performance issues.
similar_products.features: SolarWinds Network Performance Monitor (NPM) is a powerful and affordable solution that can help you quickly detect, diagnose, and resolve network performance problems and outages. NPM provides advanced network troubleshooting for on-premise, hybrid, and cloud services with critical path hop-by-hop analysis. NPM's comprehensive coverage is designed to enable an IT professional to reduce mean outage time, see return on network investments & determine how to reallocate resources for future health.

similar_products.short_desc: Automate can take care of any repetitive IT maintenance task or process, monitor mission critical network components and so much more!
similar_products.features: Whether you're an experienced MSP or an hourly rate one-man shop, the ConnectWise Automate, formerly LabTech, remote monitoring and management platform can help you significantly improve your operational productivity and efficiency by leveraging the power of IT automation. Automate's functionality can take care of any repetitive IT maintenance task or process, monitor mission critical network components and automatically run auto-remediation programs, and so much more! Start your demo!

similar_products.short_desc: Network performance monitoring and diagnostics tool that enables NetOps to analyse network traffic and troubleshoot network problems.
similar_products.features: Flowmon is a professional tool for effective network troubleshooting, performance monitoring, capacity planning, encrypted traffic analysis and cloud monitoring. Instead of just the red/green infrastructure status, it helps NetOps teams to understand user experience while keeping the amount of data noise and analytical work to a minimum. The Flowmon solution is a part of the Kemp product portfolio.

similar_products.short_desc: Anticipate, troubleshoot, and prevent performance issues regardless of where workloads, applications, or users are located.
similar_products.features:
End user experience monitoring and troubleshooting software, with embedded intelligence and automation,
that enables IT pros to anticipate, troubleshoot, and document performance issues regardless of
where workloads, applications, or users are located.

Proactively anticipate user experience issues before they happen, provide the correlated analytics to troubleshoot the problem quickly when they do and documentation of root cause so that performance issues can be permanently resolved.

similar_products.short_desc: Network monitoring solution that provides everything you expect, plus automation, huge scale, easy integration and simple pricing.
similar_products.features: NMIS manages a vast array of devices on simple to complex networks. Extend NMIS with advanced modules to get access to additional capabilities. Deploy wherever you need and only pay for the devices being managed. Fast deployment, simple pricing, hugely scalable, flexible and easy to integrate into your business. Save time with automation. Perfect for on-premises, private and public cloud. Talk to us about what you need and we'll have it covered. Book a no-obligation demo now.

similar_products.short_desc: Easily monitor very large IT environments with thousands of devices and systems across multiple locations.
similar_products.features: Paessler PRTG Enterprise Monitor is vendor agnostic. It can monitor almost every device, application, or service using all common monitoring protocols or the documented API. But even beyond classic IT, it supports industry-specific protocols to monitor medical devices, shop floors, IoT setups, and much more. It's one solution for your entire monitoring, from infrastructure to network, from applications to cloud services, from databases to storage, from virtual environments to IoT, and much more.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Application Performance Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Application Performance Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Application Performance Management software manages and measures application performance levels and status, enabling accurate, real-time observations of system health and capacity. Organizations use the sophisticated diagnostic tools provided by Application Performance Management software to make strategic resource decisions regarding their technology operations. These applications provide an integrated solution for ongoing observation, evaluation and forecasting as well as historical assessments. Application Performance Management software is related to Network Monitoring software and IT Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Computer Security software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Computer Security tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Computer Security software automates the security and monitoring of computer systems from malware, threats and unauthorized use. These applications scan and monitor an organization's computer network to evaluate potential vulnerabilities. Additionally, Computer Security solutions provide customizable network security solutions as well as those preconfigured for a variety of regulatory standards. Computer Security software provides for real-time reporting on network security as well as incident reports for potential security breaches. Computer Security software is related to Network Security software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Data Center Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Data Center Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Data Center Management software allows users to monitor and control all connected networks and devices across an entire organization. This type of software allows for application delivery, trouble shooting, and reporting across the organizational network. Data Center Management software is related to IT Asset Management software, Data Storage software, Database Management software, Network Monitoring software, and Network Security software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Database Monitoring software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Database Monitoring tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Database Monitoring software helps organizations to track, optimize and diagnose performance of their database applications.

Quickly browse through hundreds of Endpoint Detection and Response tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Endpoint Detection And Response (EDR) software helps organizations protect their networks from malicious software that can enter the system via endpoint devices.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top IT Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of IT Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: IT Management software provides the tools and process for controlling and monitoring computer networks, including: operating systems, applications, network devices, security measures, mainframes, access control systems, web services, and databases. Organizations use IT Management applications to manage activities across their systems, evaluating capacity, user activities, software inventory and installation, server availability, and virus or malware protection. IT Management software is related to Application Performance Management software, Business Continuity software, Database Management software, Server Management software, Network Monitoring software and Network Security software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Network Security software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Network Security tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Network Security software prevents unauthorized access to a computer network. Organizations use these applications to prevent unauthorized, malicious or inadvertent intrusions into or usage of secure systems. Network Security solutions are designed to recognize legitimate traffic over today's complex enterprise networks and isolate abnormal events for further investigation as well as to perform key security audit and regulatory compliance functions. Features can include anti-spam, anti-virus, and intrusion detection. Network Security software is related to Computer Security software and Network Monitoring software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Remote Monitoring and Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Remote Monitoring and Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Remote Monitoring and Management or RMM software is widely used by managed services providers to perform monitoring, maintenance and troubleshooting for their clients' IT systems.

pricing_plans.name: Basic
pricing_plans.description: The plan pricing starts from $32 for 0 endpoint/devices and 3rd party patching. For 5000 endpoints/devices and 5000 3rd party patching, the price will be $4500.

_source.short_desc: Pulseway is an award-winning IT management platform that gives you complete control over everything IT.
_source.long_desc: Monitor, manage and control your IT systems and applications in real-time using any smartphone, tablet or desktop. Pulseway has done for System Administration what smartphones did for email - you get a notification, see an issue and sort it in seconds. Monitoring is no longer a drama - you just monitor and instantly respond to server issues as soon as they arise. It's like having a NOC in your pocket.
_source.pricing_details:
Pulseway starts with a 14-day-trial, no credit card required.

Pricing is based on the number of systems/endpoints you want to monitor and manage.
_source.target_audience: Managed Service Providers (MSPs), IT departments, IT consultants and System Administrators.

media.caption: Network Monitoring - Monitor Everything with an IP Address
Monitor and get real time updates on your systems from any device, thanks to Pulseway Mobile Dashboards.
Single Pane of Glass - One Centralised RMM
Entire IT Infrastructure overview over your systems, server and network devices.

category_features.name: Dashboard
category_features.definition: An assembly of graphs and charts for tracking statistics and metrics

category_features.name: Data Management
category_features.definition: Enables users to optimize, secure, and manage large sets of data.

category_features.name: ETL
category_features.definition: Process of extracting, transforming, and loading data

category_features.name: Multiple Data Sources
category_features.definition: Allows users to manage data from a number of sources

category_features.name: Web Services
category_features.definition: Allows the integration of data between different web services

related_products.short_desc: Founded in 2011, Zapier has helped over 1.8 million individuals and businesses with their automation needs.
related_products.features: Zapier helps SMBs easily automate work without writing any code. Build custom workflows fast for more than 4,000+ web apps, and let Zapier handle repetitive tasks automatically-freeing your team up to focus on more important work. Zapier integrates with more tools than anyone, helping you streamline processes and making all your systems more efficient. And for larger teams, Zapier offers collaboration and security features that let you unlock the power of automation for your entire organization.

related_products.short_desc: Leading enterprises with complex integration needs. It handles all applications with top speed and accuracy and is highly extensible.
related_products.features: With UiPath you benefit of a highly non-intrusive, industry standard automation tool that works with all major desktop, web, ERP suite, and Citrix (virtual desktops) applications in minutes. UiPath also comes with a powerful image recognition technology, and it can recognize controls and text, too. It sees the user interface like a human, even in those Citrix-enabled virtualized environments. Cloud or on-premise, with state-of-the-art workflow designer tool and full monitoring & analytics.

related_products.short_desc: Process Street is a modern process management platform for teams.
related_products.features:
Process Street is a modern process management platform for teams. We help teams share their core processes, then transform them into powerful no-code workflows.

Start with employee onboarding to set up new hires for success, then build all sorts of workflows like employee onboarding, client onboarding, and tenant screening.

Manage your team wiki and company handbook 100% free.

Join Salesforce, Colliers, Drift, and 3,000+ other businesses who use Process Street today.

related_products.short_desc: Anypoint Platform is a leading integration platform for connecting on-premise, SaaS, and mobile systems.
related_products.features: MuleSoft's Anypoint Platform enables users to design, build, publish and manage APIs and integrations with a single product. It also contains API analytics management and a set of packaged connectors for popular applications and protocols. It can be run on-premises, in the cloud, and in hybrid configurations.

related_products.short_desc: Integrate any applications and data across your hybrid IT with speed and ease.
related_products.features:
Overcome IT complexity and break down data silos by integrating on-premises and cloud application, various data sources and devices with Boomi Integration. Create a fabric of connectivity to unlock productivity and thrive within your digital technology foundation.
Drag and drop UI, data mapping tools, and a comprehensive library of connectors, coupled with support for various integration patterns enable you to build any integrations with exceptional speed.

related_products.short_desc: Connect to any system or partner, providing visibility across your ecosystem and flexibility to scale business operations.
related_products.features: DiCentral's integration solutions connect you to any system or enterprise partner, providing visibility across your ecosystem and business model flexibility to scale business operations.  Integrate order, inventory and fulfillment data into your ERP or warehouse systems.  Send data between multiple systems with one transaction, reducing time, minimizing errors, and cutting costs.  Connect to 3PLs and carriers, your sales tax solution provider, and any other partner regardless of service type.

related_products.short_desc: Operations Hub supercharges HubSpot CRM with features to sync, clean, and automate your contacts, leads, and companies.
related_products.features:
Operations Hub allows you to connect HubSpot CRM with the rest of your business apps. It works two-ways and in real-time with contacts, leads, and company data. You'll have a truly connected CRM with dependable and up-to-date data. 

Unlike traditional out-of-the-box integrations, it offers custom solutions to connect, clean, and automate customer data. The result is an efficient, aligned, and agile business, an unhindered and strategic ops team, and a friction-free customer experience.

related_products.short_desc: Make is a visual platform that lets you design, build, and automate anything - from simple tasks to complex workflows - in minutes.
related_products.features: Make allows you to visually create, build, and automate workflows. Use the playful drag-and-drop interface to connect apps in a few clicks, and build limitless workflows called scenarios. Set your scenarios to run instantly or per schedule, or watch the scenario run in real time whenever you need.

related_products.short_desc: Studio management that saves you time, keeps your business in order, and keeps your clients happy.
related_products.features: Offers photographers a simple & intuitive solution to their client & studio management needs. Online booking & scheduling, automated workflows, invoicing, contracts, and more. Iris Works is the studio management system made for the artist. After only a few hours of setting up your studio, you're ready to begin streamlining your business.

related_products.short_desc: IFTTT is the leading connectivity platform powering the digital transformation of products into integrated services.
related_products.features:
IFTTT is the worlds leading connectivity platform. We help over 700 global enterprises accelerate the digital transformation of their products into integrated services, dramatically reducing their development costs while extending compatibility and lifetime value. IFTTT is the connectivity standard and low-code alternative to building your own integrations in-house. 

Our products have attracted 17 million consumers across 140 countries and served over 90 million activated connections.

related_products.short_desc: Omatic transforms data into value, empowering social good organizations to affect great change in the world.
related_products.features: Omatic's flagship solution for nonprofit data integration, ImportOmatic imports data into Raiser's Edge RE NXT from any external sources, supporting all record types and formats, and cleaning up data along the way. ImportOmatic redefines efficiency with intelligent integration that properly matches records, eliminates duplicates, and standardizes data as it imports.

similar_products.short_desc: Founded in 2011, Zapier has helped over 1.8 million individuals and businesses with their automation needs.
similar_products.features: Zapier helps SMBs easily automate work without writing any code. Build custom workflows fast for more than 4,000+ web apps, and let Zapier handle repetitive tasks automatically-freeing your team up to focus on more important work. Zapier integrates with more tools than anyone, helping you streamline processes and making all your systems more efficient. And for larger teams, Zapier offers collaboration and security features that let you unlock the power of automation for your entire organization.

similar_products.short_desc: Powerful low-code SaaS integration toolkit - create & publish native integrations directly into your app. Contact for a free trial.
similar_products.features:
White labelled SaaS integration toolkit for SaaS platforms and app developers, providing a complete solution to serve your customers integration needs -- all from within your application.

We enable you to deliver integrations to 400+ popular apps and services with low-code and low engineering overhead. We handle all the updates, providing developer tools that enable the creation of custom connectors and a drag and drop designer to build and publish new integrations and workflows in minutes.

similar_products.short_desc: Harness 190+ pre-built data connectors and add any additional connectors through a unique API on-demand service.
similar_products.features: Rivery is a SaaS data integration platform that enables teams to connect to any data source. Featuring 150+ prebuilt data connectors, Rivery also offers API connectors on-demand. This allows you to build robust data pipelines with the data sources that matter most to you.

similar_products.short_desc: Complete Integration software, expert in-house support, and over 30 years of EDI industry experience supporting your integration needs.
similar_products.features: Epicor EDI (formerly 1EDI Source) is a leading EDI provider and innovator with over 30 years of experience in the industry. Offering a full portfolio of EDI solutions and seamless ERP integrations, Epicor EDI supports small to mid-size and enterprise organizations. We provide you with real ERP Integration Solutions for all common ERP systems including Kinetic, Prophet 21, Microsoft Dynamics, Sage, SAP, Oracle and more.

similar_products.short_desc: Clockspring is an automation platform which uses workflow diagrams to create integrations across any software or application.
similar_products.features:
Clockspring is a state-of-the-art automation platform designed to share data between any number of systems in a robust and reliable manner.

Using a Visio-like interface, Clockspring makes complicated integration easy. If you can build a flow chart you can integrate your data.

The Clockspring data orchestration platform provides over 250 built in connectors and transformers to quickly deliver 130% ROI in the first year.

similar_products.short_desc: Alumio - an integration platform for digital commerce. Built to scale and accelerate your business for future-proof digital growth.
similar_products.features: Alumio is a cloud-based, no-code iPaaS (Integration Platform as a Service) for digital commerce. It helps create integrations between two or more systems, without any code and via a user-friendly interface. Centralizing all your integrations and data on one platform, Alumio's iPaaS helps eliminate data silos and accelerate process flows across systems for improved digital growth. Alumio offers a future-proof solution for companies looking for fast, flexible and reliable integrations.

similar_products.short_desc: Insanely Simple Process Automation: get access to the power of bots, APIs, RPA, and real human Wrkers in one easy-to-use platform.
similar_products.features:
The Wrk platform automates your labour-intensive processes with simple Automated Wrkflows, delivering top-quality results with none of the headaches. 

Wrk is the only automation platform on the market to combine bots, APIs, RPA, and a global human workforce to deliver your processes end-to-end.

similar_products.short_desc:
Hundreds of applications.
Thousands of business processes.
Millions of combinations.
ONE iPaaS.
similar_products.features: Celigo is the leading Integration Platform-as-a-Service (iPaaS) provider for the mid-market.  Named a G2 Best Software for 2021, Celigo enables breakaway growth, controlled cost management, and superior customer experiences by ensuring that every process -- at any level of the organization -- can be automated in the most optimal way. For more

similar_products.short_desc: Orchestrate the entire tech stack with ActiveBatch Workload Automation & Job Scheduling. Build and manage workflows from one place.
similar_products.features: ActiveBatch centralizes control over automated processes for dynamic enterprise-wide task orchestration and visibility. ActiveBatch's low-code approach allows users to build and report in real-time on cross-platform, end-to-end workflows, faster & more reliably, improving agility and reducing cost. Common use cases include Workload Automation, Enterprise Job Scheduling, IT Process Automation, Business Process Automation, Managed File Transfer Automation, Big Data Automation, and much more.

similar_products.short_desc: Redwoods RunMyJobs? is the only workload automation & job scheduling solution designed for & delivered via Software-as-a-Service.
similar_products.features: Redwoods RunMyJobs is the only workload automation and job scheduling solution designed for and delivered via Software-as-a-Service (SaaS). It transforms the digital enterprise with its easy scalability and simple integration with all technologies in the modern enterprise. RunMyJobs unifies workflows across on-premises, private, hybrid and public cloud environments. It bridges gaps in complex processes that function between mainframe, distributed, virtual and cloud resources.

similar_products.short_desc: Hevo is a no-code, bi-directional data pipeline platform specially built for modern ETL, ELT, and Reverse ETL needs.
similar_products.features:
Hevo is a no-code, bi-directional data pipeline platform specially built for modern ETL, ELT, and Reverse ETL Needs. It helps companies integrate org-wide data from multiple sources on a single platform resulting in saving ~10 hours of engineering time/week and 10x faster reporting, analytics, and decision making. 

The platform supports 150+ ready-to-use integrations across SaaS Applications, Databases, Cloud Storage, SDKs,  and Streaming Services, making data integration seamless and quick.

similar_products.short_desc: Adverity is an industry-leading marketing data intelligence tool that enables companies to reduce complexity and make better decisions.
similar_products.features:
Adverity is an industry-leading Data Integration
tool that enables companies to fully automate data integration from all data sources to create a single source of truth about your marketing and business performance.

Adverity is enabling data-driven marketers to make better decisions and improve performance across all campaigns and channels. Adverity makes it easy to identify opportunities to generate more revenue and demonstrate marketing ROI.

600+ Available Marketing Data Connectors!

similar_products.short_desc: SVT Robotics' tech-agnostic SOFTBOT Platform accelerates the integration and deployment of robots and automation to only days or weeks.
similar_products.features: SVT Robotics, Inc. is a software company that's revolutionizing robotics adoption in warehousing and manufacturing. When connected to the technology-agnostic SOFTBOT? Platform, companies can connect, integrate, and deploy any robot, automation, IoT device, or human productivity tool for any task in only days or weeks-faster and easier than anything previously seen in supply chain management until now.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Application Development software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Application Development tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Application Development software assists developers with the deployment of software applications. Application Development solutions aid in the creation of custom solutions for an organization's technology and information infrastructure. Typically, application development software is geared to work with a variety of common programming languages and platforms. Application Development software is related to Bug Tracking software and License Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Embedded Analytics software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Embedded Analytics tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Embedded Analytics software allows users to integrate analytical capabilities with the applications they already use and access analytical tools from within these applications.
